Articles.Content:
Salutations, soldiers.

If you are here, it means you are a member of the R.K.M. in the Atmospheric Division. If you are not, enlist now or leave.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it:

OBJECTIVE: Build an aeroplane that can fire 3 different WMD\'s: Jack\'s Dumb Bomb, and the JellyCube Wasp Missile and Railgun. Video or image proof is required.

REWARD: An upgrade to your rank, shown with a change to your roster and signature

DEADLINE: Zero-hundred hours on the fifteenth day of the first month in the twelfth year of the first decade of the first century of the second millennium.

OBJECTIVE: Build an aeroplane that can fire 3 different WMD\'s: Jack\'s Dumb Bomb, the Wasp Missile from Amphibious Parts, and the JellyCubes Railgun. Video or image proof is required.

Sir! Sorry for correcting you, but Wasp Missile is JellyCubes\' too.

And all of \'em do not do no \'mass destruction\' =P

Sir! Sorry for correcting you, but Wasp Missile is JellyCubes\' too.

Good work, son.

From now on, your name is Private F7.

You got that?

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=5044.0

YT video is inside that thread.

Win.
Why are all of the challenges named '1'?

Why are all of the challenges named '1'?

The first in a series of many.

I want you to win SO badly, but you\'re not in the R.K.M.

Join and you\'ll be in first place.

I could kill that mothership so easily with my much more nimble Delta II, though. And that craft lacks railguns.

Three munitions for the railgun, two missiles that actually fly straight, and one dumb bomb, all mounted on a very maneuverable craft capable of vertical or horizontal landings.
By the way, you set the deadline to 2022. 'Twelfth year of the second decade' = 12 years after 2010.

By the way, you set the deadline to 2022. 'Twelfth year of the second decade' = 12 years after 2010.

Oops.

Bah, the world\'ll be over by then.

I could kill that mothership so easily with my much more nimble Delta II, though. And that craft lacks railguns.

Three munitions for the railgun, two missiles that actually fly straight, and one dumb bomb, all mounted on a very maneuverable craft capable of vertical or horizontal landings.

Cardgame is right, it technically does not qualify. It only has bombs. Not to mention how slow and big that \'mothership\' is.

I could kill that mothership so easily with my much more nimble Delta II, though. And that craft lacks railguns.

Three munitions for the railgun, two missiles that actually fly straight, and one dumb bomb, all mounted on a very maneuverable craft capable of vertical or horizontal landings.

You are completely right. Motherships are useless, and it\'s all bark and no bite.

I was foolishly going for awesomeness alone. Not anymore...

I could kill that mothership so easily with my much more nimble Delta II, though. And that craft lacks railguns.

Thats why it has a fighter attached to it... Also there is a Railgun on the fighter that has 4 rounds
